sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item ( FCCC/SBSTA/2009/INF.1 and FCCC/SB/2009/1-3).

Bruce Wilson, Australia, reported on work of the Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT), highlighting a strategy paper on the long-term perspective beyond 2012, future financing options, and performance indicators. ARGENTINA emphasized the need to ensure environmentally-friendly production patterns.
SWITZERLAND stressed energy efficient technologies and said intellectual property rights (IPRs) can promote technology transfer.
BANGLADESH noted the need for technologies that enable the disabled to respond to disasters.

The INTERNATIONAL COUNCIL FOR SUSTAINABLE ENERGY and THE GLOBAL WIND ENERGY COUNCIL urged a strong post-2012 agreement with clear mid and long-term targets to promote diffusion of clean energy technologies, and direct investment to develop and commercialize new technologies.
A joint SBSTA/SBI contact group will be co-chaired by Holger Liptow (Germany) and Carlos Fuller (Belize).
